thread.title: State agency opens investigation into window replacement, use of bonds by former Fall River Mayor Will Flanagan - News
thread.title_full: State agency opens investigation into window replacement, use of bonds by former Fall River Mayor Will Flanagan - News

author: lily
title: State agency opens investigation into window replacement, use of bonds by former Fall River Mayor Will Flanagan - News
text: Published Discard Success! FALL RIVER — The installation of 22 improperly authorized windows and the use of a $560,000 bond for renovations to the sixth floor of Government Center under former Mayor Will Flanagan has caught the attention of the Massachusetts Office of the Inspector General — and the agency, which investigates government fraud, has opened an investigation.
